If doctor permits you to go ahead with Phentermine at the time of pregnancy period, you must gradually reduce the dose and avoid the symptoms of disengagement. Before deciding on Phentermine, please feel the instructions and quantity of doses written over the leaflet. Do not follow self-medication practice, it may result in abnormalities.

In conjunction with above stated abnormalities, types of side effects of Phentermine during pregnancy period plus they are as follows.

o Phentermine can lead to allergic reactions during pregnancy stage.

o You may well feel abnormality in breathing.

o Throat choking in pregnant women is a common unwanted effect of the Phentermine.

o It may lead in swelling with lips and face.

o Phentermine may lead to risk of abnormal babies.

o Phentermine may cause abnormal heartbeats and the risk of high blood pressure.

o Headache and the dizziness occur with pregnant women due to Phentermine.

o Diarrhea together with constipation are other minor adverse reactions of the Phentermine, with pregnancy.

o The common and minor side effects in pregnancy are soar throat, confusion, anxiety, insomnia along with the abnormal taste.

o There is usually a risk of impotency as a result of Phentermine.

Basically Phentermine is a type of medication that is used for reducing the appetite and obesity as it simulates the nervous systems with pregnant cases.

In general, Phentermine is not recommended for pregnant a lot of women as losing weight can lead to under-weight babies or with abnormality such as neural defect in which the spinal has abnormality. In case of such problems, marketing promotions campaigns to get examined to have a healthy baby.
